episodes.title: 'Dances with Wolves' actor Nathan Chasing Horse found guilty of 13 charges in sex crimes trial
episodes.description: Channel 13 senior reporter Alyssa Bethencourt has been following the trial of Nathan Chasing Horse since the beginning and was in the courtroom to witness the emotional reaction to the jury's verdict.

episodes.title: FULL VERDICT READING: Jury finds Nathan Chasing Horse guilty of multiple sex crimes
episodes.description: This comes after nearly nine hours of deliberations over two days after closing arguments in the trial nearly three years in the making.

episodes.title: Jury deliberates 6 hours without verdict in sex crimes trial of Nathan Chasing Horse
episodes.description: Channel 13 senior reporter Alyssa Bethencourt has been following developments in the trial of Nathan Chasing Horse since the beginning. She reports live from the Regional Justice Center with the latest developments as the jury works to decide Chasing Horse's fate.

episodes.title: Nathan Chasing Horse sexual abuse trial goes to jury after closing arguments
episodes.description: Prosecutors and defense attorneys delivered closing arguments Tuesday in the Nathan Chasing Horse trial, with the case now in the hands of a jury of four men and eight women.

episodes.title: Nathan Chasing Horse defense calls neurologist, family member as trial nears end
episodes.description: Nathan Chasing Horse, an actor facing sexual assault and kidnapping charges chose not to testify in his own defense

episodes.title: Nathan Chasing Horse trial continues with police testimony, evidence from home search
episodes.description: Day four of Nathan Chasing Horse trial featured Metro Police testimony about home search evidence and continued questioning of alleged victims.

episodes.title: Two alleged victims testify in Nathan Chasing Horse trial, describing abuse and control
episodes.description: Jurors in the Nathan Chasing Horse trial heard emotional testimony Wednesday from two women who  say they were abused as children by a man they once trusted as a spiritual leader.

episodes.title: Jury selected in Nathan Chasing Horse trial after four days of questioning
episodes.description: Chasing Horse is accused of sexually abusing Indigenous women and girls over a span of more than a decade. Prosecutors allege he used his reputation to gain trust and control over his alleged victims.

episodes.title: Jury selection underway in sex crimes trial of ‘Dances With Wolves’ actor Nathan Chasing Horse
episodes.description: The criminal case against former "Dances With Wolves" actor Nathan Chasing Horse moved forward Tuesday as jury selection began in a Clark County courtroom.

episodes.title: Nathan Chasing Horse's alleged victim says she was 'shocked' at Nevada high court dismissal
episodes.description: Accused cult leader Nathan Chasing Horse is facing new charges related to child pornography in the North Las Vegas justice court.

episodes.title: Prosecutors to take Nathan Chasing Horse case back to grand jury
episodes.description: The Clark County District Attorney's Office will refile charges against Nathan Chasing Horse and take the case to a grand jury, the office confirming to Channel 13 on Thursday afternoon.

episodes.title: What's the chance of Chasing Horse case getting dismissed by Nevada Supreme Court?
episodes.description: The Nevada Supreme Court has set a date to consider the case against Nathan Chasing Horse. Jaewon Jung reports.

episodes.title: Nathan Chasing Horse asking Nevada Supreme Court to dismiss charges
episodes.description: Chasing Horse was originally set to stand trial on May 1 after a grand jury charged him with 18 felonies including sexual assault of a minor, kidnapping, lewdness and child abuse.

episodes.title: Judge issues indefinite stay on Chasing Horse sex abuse trial
episodes.description: The sexual abuse trial of a “Dances With Wolves” actor charged in Nevada is on hold indefinitely after a stay was granted by a Las Vegas judge.  Bryan Horwath reports.  Story: https://www.ktnv.com/news/chasing-horses-nevada-sex-abuse-trial-on-hold-indefinitely

episodes.title: 'Dances With Wolves' actor told women 'spirits' told him to sexually assault, transcripts show
episodes.description: A Metro police forensic scientist also testified that a large amount of psilocybin or magic mushrooms was found in his home. Jaewon Jung reports.

episodes.title: 'Dances With Wolves' actor indicted by grand jury, facing 19 felony charges
episodes.description: The case against accused cult leader Nathan Chasing Horse was dismissed for North Las Vegas court on Wednesday morning. Jaewon Jung reports.  Story: https://www.ktnv.com/news/case-against-alleged-cult-leader-nathan-chasing-horse-heads-to-grand-jury-trial

episodes.title: North Las Vegas judge sets $300K bail order for 'Dances with Wolves' actor
episodes.description: Former actor and accused cult leader Nathan Chasing Horse is now facing federal charges along with county charges. Jaewon Jung reports.

episodes.title: 'Dances With Wolves' actor facing life charges in Nevada sex abuse case
episodes.description: Clark County prosecutors filed additional charges in the case against Nathan Chasing Horse, the former "Dances with Wolves" actor arrested for sex trafficking and child sexual abuse. Abel Garcia reports.

episodes.title: IN COURT: Judge sets no bail for 'Dances with Wolves' actor accused of sex abuse
episodes.description: A North Las Vegas judge ruled there was enough probable cause to hold actor Nathan Chasing Horse in jail before a bail hearing scheduled for next week. Read the latest developments at ktnv.com/news/crime

episodes.title: Exploiting isolation: Native actor accused of using his culture to exploit Indigenous girls
episodes.description: In the wake of former "Dances With Wolves" actor Nathan Chasing Horse's arrest, a local psychiatrist warns many may be vulnerable to cults of personality. Sean DeLancey reports.

episodes.title: Report: Actor Nathan Chasing Horse 'abused his power' to rape underage girls
episodes.description:
An arrest report obtained by KTNV lays out 53 pages of allegations that "Dances with Wolves" actor Nathan Chasing Horse sexually abused multiple minor children. Sean DeLancey reports. 

You can read more at ktnv.com/news/crime
